audioText: Le document a été vérifié trois fois par différents experts avant sa publication officielle.
question: What happened to the document?
options: It was verified three times by experts
It was written by three authors
It was translated into different languages
explanation: The text states 'Le document a été vérifié trois fois par différents experts avant sa publication officielle' - The document was verified three times by different experts before its official publication. The past participle 'vérifié' (verified) shows the completed action.
